entry.source: 〉 There's a glowing recession in{F801}the wall...{F801}{F802}〉 Lift your hand to it?{F801}
entry.target: 〉 There's a glowing recession in{F801}the wall...{F801}{F802}〉 Lift your hand to it?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,1}Crouch down... Crouch down...{F801}Into the cage you go...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,1}Crouch down... Crouch down...{F801}Into the cage you go...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,1}When will the bird in the coop die...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,1}When will the bird in the coop die...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,1}Who is the one... with the imprudent{F801}mask...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,1}Who is the one... with the imprudent{F801}mask...?{F801}
